title_narrative: Commonwealth Climate Finance Access Hub II
description_narrative: The Climate Finance Access Hub facilitates improved access by small and vulnerable Commonwealth countries to climate finance to meet their priority needs in realising the sustainable development goals. To do this, the Hub will place long-term advisers at national and regional levels within small states and Least Developed Countries (LDCs) to support national effects to access and effectively use international climate finance. The work of the Climate Finance Access Hub is informed by national and regional priorities and has a strong action for South-South cooperation, exchange and mutual learning. the Total value of this investment is $1 million to be expensed in the 2018-19 financial year, with activities taking place until mid-2020.
